tasks.label: build_dir_little
tasks.command: if [ ! -d ./build_LITTLE ]; then mkdir build_LITTLE; else cd build_LITTLE && rm -rf * ;fi

tasks.label: build_dir_parallel
tasks.command: if [ ! -d ./build_PARALLEL ]; then mkdir build_PARALLEL; else cd build_PARALLEL && rm -rf * ;fi

tasks.label: build_dir_debug_little
tasks.command: if [ ! -d ./build_DEBUG ]; then mkdir build_DEBUG; else cd build_DEBUG && rm -rf * ;fi

tasks.label: create_links_debug_little
tasks.command: cd test_debug && ln -s ../test_files/dns.ini && ln -s ../build_DEBUG/inigrid.x && ln -s ../build_DEBUG/inirand.x && ln -s ../build_DEBUG/iniscal.x && ln -s ../build_DEBUG/iniflow.x && ln -s ../build_DEBUG/dns.x

tasks.label: run_ini_debug_little
tasks.command: cd test_debug && ./inigrid.x && ./inirand.x && ./iniflow.x && ./iniscal.x && mv flow.ics.1 flow.0.1 && mv flow.ics.2 flow.0.2 && mv flow.ics.3 flow.0.3 && mv scal.ics.1 scal.0.1

tasks.label: create_links_little
tasks.command: cd test_little && ln -s ../test_files/dns.ini && ln -s ../build_LITTLE/inigrid.x && ln -s ../build_LITTLE/inirand.x && ln -s ../build_LITTLE/iniscal.x && ln -s ../build_LITTLE/iniflow.x && ln -s ../build_LITTLE/dns.x

tasks.label: run_ini_little
tasks.command: cd test_little && ./inigrid.x && ./inirand.x && ./iniflow.x && ./iniscal.x && mv flow.ics.1 flow.0.1 && mv flow.ics.2 flow.0.2 && mv flow.ics.3 flow.0.3 && mv scal.ics.1 scal.0.1

tasks.label: create_links_parallel
tasks.command: cd test_parallel && ln -s ../test_files/dns.ini && ln -s ../build_PARALLEL/inigrid.x && ln -s ../build_PARALLEL/inirand.x && ln -s ../build_PARALLEL/iniscal.x && ln -s ../build_PARALLEL/iniflow.x && ln -s ../build_PARALLEL/dns.x

tasks.label: run_ini_parallel
tasks.command: cd test_parallel && ./inigrid.x && mpirun -np 4 ./inirand.x && mpirun -np 4 ./iniflow.x && mpirun -np 4 ./iniscal.x && mv flow.ics.1 flow.0.1 && mv flow.ics.2 flow.0.2 && mv flow.ics.3 flow.0.3 && mv scal.ics.1 scal.0.1
